001package ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort.PosterReport;
005import java.time.Duration;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.Properties;
008import org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.KafkaProducer;
009import org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.Producer;
010import org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.ProducerConfig;
011import org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.ProducerRecord;
012import org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringSerializer;
013
014/**
015 * Kafka poster adapter that publishes formatted {@link PosterReport} payloads to a Kafka topic.
016 * <p>Acts as the infrastructure adapter for {@link ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort}
017 * and delegates publishing to an underlying {@link Producer}. Instances are thread-safe when the
018 * supplied producer is thread-safe (the default {@link KafkaProducer} is).
019 *
020 * @implNote Records are enqueued asynchronously; invoke {@link #close()} to flush buffers before
021 * shutting down the pipeline.
022 * @see ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort
023 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
024 */
025public final class KafkaPosterOutputAdapter implements PosterOutputPort {
026  private final Producer<String, String> producer;
027  private final String topic;
028
029  /**
030   * Creates a poster output adapter backed by a new {@link KafkaProducer}.
031   *
032   * @param bootstrapServers comma-separated Kafka bootstrap servers
033   * @param topic Kafka topic that receives poster reports
034   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code bootstrapServers} is {@code null}
035   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code bootstrapServers} is blank or {@code topic} is {@code null} or blank
036   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
037   */
038  public KafkaPosterOutputAdapter(String bootstrapServers, String topic) {
039    this(createProducer(bootstrapServers), sanitizeTopic(topic));
040  }
041
042  KafkaPosterOutputAdapter(Producer<String, String> producer, String topic) {
043    this.producer = Objects.requireNonNull(producer, "producer");
044    this.topic = sanitizeTopic(topic);
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Enqueues a {@link PosterReport} for asynchronous publication to Kafka.
049   *
050   * @param report poster report to publish; must not be {@code null}
051   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code report} is {@code null}
052   * @implNote Uses {@link PosterReport#txId()} as the record key and {@link PosterReport#content()}
053   *     as the payload without additional mutation.
054   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
055   */
056  @Override
057  public void write(PosterReport report) {
058    Objects.requireNonNull(report, "report");
059    producer.send(new ProducerRecord<>(topic, report.txId(), report.content()));
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Flushes pending Kafka records and closes the producer.
064   *
065   * @implNote Waits up to five seconds for in-flight send operations to complete.
066   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
067   */
068  @Override
069  public void close() {
070    producer.flush();
071    producer.close(Duration.ofSeconds(5));
072  }
073
074  private static Producer<String, String> createProducer(String bootstrapServers) {
075    Objects.requireNonNull(bootstrapServers, "bootstrapServers");
076    String trimmed = bootstrapServers.trim();
077    if (trimmed.isEmpty()) {
078      throw new IllegalArgumentException("bootstrapServers must not be blank");
079    }
080    Properties props = new Properties();
081    props.put(ProducerConfig.BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG, trimmed);
082    props.put(ProducerConfig.ACKS_CONFIG, "all");
083    props.put(ProducerConfig.LINGER_MS_CONFIG, 5);
084    props.put(ProducerConfig.KEY_SERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringSerializer.class.getName());
085    props.put(ProducerConfig.VALUE_SERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringSerializer.class.getName());
086    return new KafkaProducer<>(props);
087  }
088
089  private static String sanitizeTopic(String topic) {
090    if (topic == null) {
091      throw new IllegalArgumentException("topic must not be null");
092    }
093    String trimmed = topic.trim();
094    if (trimmed.isEmpty()) {
095      throw new IllegalArgumentException("topic must not be blank");
096    }
097    return trimmed;
098  }
099}
